results.overview: In this actioner, a bounty hunter is assigned to bring back an enormous and angry ex-convict who wears a deadly glove made of leather and steel. Rock'em sock'em mayhem ensues.
results.title: The Glove

results.original_title: Uomini si nasce poliziotti si muore
results.overview: Fred and Tony are members of an elite 'special squad' of police in Rome, Italy who are licensed-to-kill, undercover cops  and who love to live dangerously.
results.title: Live Like a Cop, Die Like a Man

results.overview: Project K.I.C.K was a drug given to cattle to make them grow quicker, if the meat is eaten from these cattle it has horrible side effects. James is a martial artist hired by the DEA to find to a dealer his former Master who is trying to start selling the drug in an American. But little does James know not is what it seems.
results.title: Capital Punishment

results.original_title: I familiari delle vittime non saranno avvertiti
results.overview: Hit man Antonio Mancuso travels to Italy to make the big time. He meets and befriends Mafia boss Don Vincenzo. Mancurso becomes part of the organization and the more he gets to know Vincenzo the more he wants his job but Mancurso will learn that success can come at a severe cost.
results.title: Crime Boss

results.overview: This biographical docu-drama alternates between two parallel threads in the life of Arnold Schwarzenegger: his formative early years as the repeat winner of the Mr. Olympia body-building championship; and his modern foray into the world of politics, hitting the campaign trail and competing in the frenzied atmosphere that accompanied California's chaotic recall election.
results.title: See Arnold Run

results.overview: A down-on-his-luck author makes the find of a lifetime in the remote Columbian jungle, in the form of an alien spacecraft . He sets off to announce his find to the world, but finds that a mishmash of government agents, organized crime members, neo-Nazi extremists and extraterrestrials are all out to prevent him from revealing his discovery.
results.title: Top Line

results.overview: An accident causes the activation of the top-secret Cyber Warrior or 'Cyw' before his programming has been completed. Concerned that the Cyw may fall into the hands of enemies, prove unable to control or simply receive unwanted attention from the public or foreign powers, the military dispatches a crack squad led by Colonel Hammer to bring back the Cyw one way or another. (from Giallo Fever blog)
results.title: Cy-Warrior

results.overview: A team of treasure hunters take over Alcatraz Island in search of diamonds and encounter a shape-changing alien.
results.title: Reptilicant

results.overview: A criminal sentenced to life on a prison planet reveals his true purpose: to extract revenge on the killers who murdered his family.
results.title: Angry Planet

results.overview: A retired agent from an Intelligence Agency is contacted by the Agency in order to stop an ultra-secret robot who is killing some government officials. That will be not an easy task, because the robot looks human and it was specifically built to be an efficient killer, not to mention that it is almost invulnerable.
results.title: Assassin

results.overview: The perfect killing machine is reprogrammed to think and feel.
results.title: Perfect: Android Rising

results.overview: Ross, Farris and Lee are star pupils of the Ninja Master, but Ross is secretly building his own ninja empire and dealing in the slave trade, headed by two slave masters Old Fox and Kong. When Ross kills the master, the two brothers must battle their way through an army of ninjas to bring the wrongdoers to justice.
results.title: Ninja of the Magnificence

results.original_title: やくざ刑事　マリファナ密売組織
results.overview: An undercover cop insinuates himself into a yakuza family. Managing to avert an assassination attack on the boss he is assigned to kill a rival boss.
results.title: Kamikaze Cop, Marihuana Syndicate

results.overview: Steve, a young kickboxer, returns home to find his parents have been brutalized by a gang of martial artists. When the cops can't find any answers, Steve decides to kickbox his way to savage justice. No thug on the streets is safe!
results.title: Blood Hands

results.overview: An ex-mercenary is enlisted back into the life to rescue the boyfriend of the daughter of a powerful mogul.
results.title: The Russian Ninja

results.overview: Two brothers, one wrongly accused of a crime, go on a mission of vengeance to find the men who framed him.
results.title: Black List

results.overview: A kung-fu master hunts down the villain who killed his mother.
results.title: The Steel Fisted Dragon

results.overview: A wild gang of bikers who shamelessly idolize the Nazis, brutalizes anyone or anything that stands in their way. Dealing in illegal weapons, assassinations, power and violence, they seem invincible until they push one man too far... When his girlfriend is savagely murdered, he declares a personal war...but to destroy them, he has to join them!
results.title: The Tormentors
